quote: I learned quickly that being able to be that all bases cover type of professional is really invaluable to retaining clients in the long term.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of comprehensive client service.
suggested_hook: Why being a jack-of-all-trades can actually be your secret weapon in real estate.

quote: The conversations definitely shifting depending on who you're talking with. I think it's a little bit of an easier conversation with buyers this year.
why_clipworthy: Provides a timely insight into current market dynamics.
suggested_hook: How to navigate conversations with buyers in today's market.
